HERO.TITLE: STRIDE - User Guide
HERO.SUB: Manage parcels by day: capture rows, mark packed/paid/delivered, assign couriers, save snapshots, and export/import data. This guide explains every option in the app.

ABOUT.TITLE: About the App
ABOUT.BODY: STRIDE lets you record a day’s parcels by date, mark their status (packed, paid, delivered), assign a courier, and track amounts. Data is auto-saved per date in your browser (localStorage) with a working copy in sessionStorage. You can also export to JSON and import later.

TOPBAR.TITLE: Top Bar
TOPBAR.DATE: Date — chooses the working day. Each date has its own sheet.
TOPBAR.NEW: New — creates a fresh sheet for today (resets table).
TOPBAR.HISTORY: History — opens the saved snapshots panel.
TOPBAR.EXPORT_ALL: Export all — download a JSON with all autosaves & snapshots.
TOPBAR.IMPORT: Import… — load a previously exported JSON (single sheet or all data).
TOPBAR.CLEAR: Clear storage — remove all local data (autosaves, snapshots, session).

SHEET.TITLE: Daily Sheet
SHEET.AMOUNT: Amount — e.g., “30 000” or “30k”. Non-numeric chars are ignored; “k” = thousand.
SHEET.COURIER: Courier — select (DERA, HERY, ALPHA, NJAKA, MAMY).
SHEET.AUTOSAVE_CARD_BODY: The app autosaves shortly after each edit (~250 ms debounce).

ACTIONS.TITLE: Sheet Actions
ACTIONS.CHECK: Check all (Packed) — mark “Packed” on every line.
ACTIONS.REMOVE: Remove all lines — clear all lines in the sheet.
ACTIONS.SNAP: Save snapshot / Update snapshot — save a frozen copy of the sheet (with name + timestamp) or overwrite the linked snapshot.

SNAPSHOTS.TITLE: Snapshots
SNAPSHOTS.BODY: Snapshots are manual saves with a name and timestamp. You can Load, Rename, or Delete. The table also shows delivered count and delivered total computed from the snapshot.

FILES.TITLE: Export / Import
FILES.EXPORT: Export all — JSON with every autosave and snapshot.
FILES.IMPORT: Import… — accepts a “sheet” JSON (replaces only current sheet) or an “all-data” JSON (replaces autosaves + snapshots after confirmation).
FILES.LOCAL: Everything is stored locally in the browser — nothing is sent to a server.

SUMMARY.TITLE: Summary by Courier
SUMMARY.BODY: Totals for rows marked “Delivered”, grouped by courier. Useful for end-of-day reconciliation.

FAQ.TITLE: Quick FAQ
FAQ.A1: In your browser: localStorage (per date + snapshots) and sessionStorage (working copy).
FAQ.A2: Yes — via Options → Export all. Re-import later with Options → Import….
FAQ.A3: Use Options → Clear storage (wipe everything) or New (new sheet for today only).
